overview: After a hard heart operation, 14-year-old Malene is isolated at home, far from her rap group, Hustlers4Lyfe. She decides to join the others for a party with Kasper, but there is a new alpha female in the group, so Malene has to fight to win her place in the sling back. But her attempts to play hard push her further away from what she cares about, so she must muster the courage to stand by her true feelings.
title: Hjerte lille
